name: Blocktanium
description: Blocktanium is an ERC-20 token, adopted as the Blocktane ecosystem token to enable users to maximize their utility of the Blocktane exchange and its growing network of digital asset tools. Holding BKT unlocks reduced fee tiers on Blocktane.io and BKT is paid as referral code bonuses to new users of Blocktane.io New functionalities will be announced soon.
